casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Matthew Joseph SCHMIEDER No. 264P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 James R. Parish, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Schmieder, Matthew Joseph. Neil C. Dalton, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of July 2019 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of July 2019 by Defendant to Deem Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of July 2019 by Defendant in the Alternative to Treat the Petition for Discretionary Review as a Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
